attributes.action: take long haul lorries off the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All long haul freight should go by train {overnight preferably}
this would give the rail network cash to improve networks 
take lorries off the main roads
easing congestion on motorways
reduce fuel and its affects 
as one train can do the work of many lorries
also in the long term 
allow the rail network to reduce commuter fairs getting people back on the trains and not in their cars
